member.name: T:MimeTypeExtension.MimeTypeExtension
member.summary: MIME-Type Extension for FileInfo and Url

member.name: M:MimeTypeExtension.MimeTypeExtension.MimeTypeOrDefault(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Get the MimeType from URL. If MimeType not found you can give a default MimeType

member.name: M:MimeTypeExtension.MimeTypeExtension.MimeType(System.IO.FileInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Get the MimeType from File-Extension. If MimeType not found you can give a default MimeType

member.name: M:MimeTypeExtension.MimeTypeExtension.MimeTypeOrDefault(System.IO.FileInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Get the MimeType from File-Extension. If MIME not found you can give a default MIME If you don't give a default value the Default is: application/octet-stream
member.returns: Returns the MIME-Type eg. Image/jpg or application/octet-stream
